Titles.jpn: ぷっちみく♪ D4DJ Petit Mix

Summaries.eng: A mini-anime series featuring characters from the D4DJ Groovy Mix mobile gamex.
Summaries.jpn:
いつもハッピー！「Happy Around!」ストイックな王者！「Peaky P-key」
星空を彩る光！「Photon Maiden」人生は楽しむためにある！「Merm4id」
今宵も紡ぐは彼女たちの物語！「燐舞曲」愛らしさ説明不要！「Lyrical Lily」

彼女たちのまだ見ぬ一面(？)に出会えるガールズDJコメディが、いま始まる！

Titles.jpn: 彼方からの招待状

Summaries.eng: The six units are introduced at the Unknown Underground Unbelievable Ultimate Fes. (U4 Fes.), a mysterious music festival that takes place once every 100 years. Happy Around! receives its invitation in the mail, and although the four agree to participate, Rei notices the lack of a return address.

Titles.jpn: ハッピーダンスで ウッ! ハッ! ウッ! ハッ!

Summaries.eng: While Maho ponders what Happy Around! needs to improve on, Rinku suggests dancing. After the four attempt to follow popular dances and fail, Rinku proclaims dancing is about being passionate and creates an image of Africa with the unit dressed in animal costumes. Happy Around! emulates The Lion King with their dance, ending with Muni raising Nyochio.

Titles.jpn: ピキピキのドキドキ! 替え玉大作戦

Summaries.eng: Peaky P-key's popularity draws the media to them for interviews, which reaches the point where they interfere with the unit's practice and daily lives. With a concert approaching, Esora creates robot counterparts of the four that participate in the press functions while the actual girls practice. Shortly before the performance, the four notice the robots have been severely worn down and tearfully give their blessings as they go on stage.

Titles.jpn: Photon Maidenのコズミック色診断
テンアゲ! Merm4idリモート会議
燐舞曲の悪夢
召しませリリリリ♪ご機嫌おやつ

Summaries.eng: Lyrical Lily was elegantly having afternoon tea in the Arisugawa Academy gardens... when Kurumi brings in a heap of snacks?!

Titles.jpn: 幻への道

Summaries.eng:
"Wait, aren't we forgetting something?"

Happy Around! had completely forgotten to register for the Legendary Fes.

What do we do?!

Titles.eng: Battles of Honor and Muscles: Deadly Fight in Nakano
Titles.jpn: 筋肉少女の仁義なき戦い ~中野私闘篇~

Summaries.eng:
What you need for DJing... muscles!

What you need for performances... muscles!

What you need to hype up the Fes.... muscles!

A fierce battle is about to begin...

Titles.jpn: 歌声♡ひみつ会議

Summaries.eng:
"Let's discuss how we can improve our singing voice!"

The members Rinku called together brought with them items that helps their singing.

Titles.jpn: せんとうパーティー

Summaries.eng:
Muni Ohnaruto is guided by fate, and visits an unexplored land.

What awaits her at the end of her journey...?

Titles.jpn: にょちおとむに

Summaries.eng:
"What can I do to be considered the cutest in this school?!"

To bring out the cuteness in Muni-chan!

A super producer rises up!

The name is... Nyochio!

Titles.jpn: 夢への試練

Summaries.eng:
Hey! Hey! Hey! The U4 FES. preliminaries has begun!

Numerous trials are given to the chosen DJ units!

Can Rinku and her friends pass the preliminaries?!

Titles.jpn: 麗の新たなる挑戦

Summaries.eng:
Maho is feeling inadequate again, "I think there's more we can do."
Rei proposes trying new instruments.
HapiAra's new possibility opens up! Or maybe not...?
Summaries.jpn: 「なんか物足りないなあ」と、再び思い悩む真秀。 そこで、新しい楽器へのチャレンジを申し出る麗。 ハピアラの新たなる可能性の扉が今！開かれる…？

Titles.jpn: おひとりさまホリデー

Summaries.eng:
A good rest is essential for the best performance!
Kyoko sets out to town alone, without the other members.
Little did she know that Peaky miracles awaited her...
Summaries.jpn: 最高のパフォーマンスのためには休息も必要だよね！ と、たまにはメンバーと離れて一人で街に出た響子。 そんな彼女に訪れるPeakyな奇跡の数々……

Titles.jpn: Photon Maidenのギャラクティカ東京探訪

Summaries.eng:
Producer Shano gives Photon Maiden a day off.
Towa proposes showing Saki around Tokyo.
The four's bonds deepen through the sightseeing.
Their bonds will surely take them to a new universe...!
Summaries.jpn: 紗乃Pから突然のオフをもらったPhoton Maiden。 乙和の提案で咲姫を東京案内に連れていくことに。 みんなと景色を巡り、重なり合っていく4人の絆。 それはきっと、宇宙にも届くはず……！

Titles.jpn: 無人島サバイバル・ウォー

Summaries.eng: Merm4id becomes stranded on a deserted island while on their way to a resort. In spite of their predicament, the four collect food with ease before assembling a raft. As they depart the island, they are swallowed by a whale before being shot out through its blowhole.
Summaries.jpn: Merm4idは、リゾートに向かう途中、無人島で立ち往生します。 彼らの苦境にもかかわらず、4人はいかだを組み立てる前に簡単に食べ物を集めます。 彼らが島を離れるとき、彼らはその噴気孔から撃たれる前にクジラに飲み込まれます。

Titles.jpn: 戦慄令嬢～どうあがいても…絶叫～

Summaries.eng: Rondo is celebrating a successful show with drinks at a rooftop restaurant when Hiiro asks the group if they have experienced something "sweet" recently, though they fail to provide good answers. After Aoi changes the restaurant's background music, the four picture performing the song and Hiiro realizes they were unable to find anything sweet as they already have the unit. Noticing Tsubaki's gaze and her ordering a drink called a Glad Eye, Hiiro points out the definition of a glad-eye, to her embarrassment.
Summaries.jpn: ロンドは、ひいろがグループに最近「甘い」何かを経験したかどうか尋ねたとき、屋上のレストランで飲み物を飲みながら成功したショーを祝っていますが、彼らは良い答えを提供していません。 葵がレストランのBGMを変えた後、歌を演奏している4枚の写真とひいろは、すでにユニットを持っているので、甘いものを見つけることができなかったことに気づきます。 椿の視線とグラッドアイと呼ばれる飲み物の注文に気づいたヒイロは、彼女の恥ずかしさにグラッドアイの定義を指摘します。

Titles.jpn: 戦慄令嬢～どうあがいても…絶叫～

Summaries.eng: Lyrical Lily is preparing to host a concert in a church when a blackout occurs. After lighting a candle lamp, Haruna attempts to console Miyu and investigate, both of which Miiko and Kurumi point out are common death tropes in horror films. Ghosts appear in the building, scaring Haruna and Miyu until Kurumi turns on the lights and reveals they are a product of her projection mapping as she feels an exorcism theme would fit their show.
Summaries.jpn: リリカルリリーは、停電が発生したときに教会でコンサートを主催する準備をしています。 ろうそくのランプを灯した後、ハルナはミユを慰め、調査しようとします。ミイコとクルミはどちらもホラー映画の一般的な死の比喩であると指摘しています。 幽霊が建物に現れ、クルミがライトをオンにして、悪魔払いのテーマが彼らのショーに合うと感じた彼女のプロジェクションマッピングの産物であると明らかにするまで、ハルナとミユを怖がらせます。

Titles.eng: Life or Death?! The Battlefield of D
Titles.jpn: りんく、荒野を走れ。
りりかるどり~む♪ノアノアランド

Titles.eng: She That Pranks Hiiro Pranks Herself
Titles.jpn: 緋彩呪わば穴ファンシー

Titles.eng: Sigh Over a Cup of Coffee
Titles.jpn: 珈琲1杯分のため息
想い出フォトダイアリー
誰がために...
永遠なれ, 愛しきディグラーたち
